articles.title: 'Bit like normal again': hair salons and wedding venues reopen in England - The Guardian
articles.description: Marriages and haircuts take place the minute the government’s coronavirus lockdown deadline passes at midnight
articles.content:
Whether its getting a haircut or getting married, a small sense of normality has returned to England just after midnight, with hair salons and wedding venues reopening.

articles.author: Ellie Kirwin-Jones
articles.title: Susanna Reid: GMB host 'confronts two men' in supermarket car park 'Heart was pounding' - Express
articles.description: SUSANNA REID - who hosts Good Morning Britain alongside Piers Morgan - has opened up about how she recently confronted two men in a supermarket car park and admitted her 'heart was pounding' when she walked away from the situation.
